item.title: 非洲顶级服装零售商反弹，计划推动增长
item.description: 非洲最大的服装零售商百福控股有限公司（Pepkor Holdings Ltd.）的股价攀升至三年来的最高点，原因是该公司宣布的股息超出了分析师的预期，而且该集团概述了一项扩张计划，其中包括多达 300 家新店。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. climbed to the highest in three years as Africa’s largest clothing retailer declared a dividend that beat analysts’ estimates and the group outlined a expansion plans that include as many as 300 new stores.】

item.title: 香港大亨郑氏珠宝在经济放缓中收入锐减
item.description: 中国最大的珠宝零售商周大福珠宝集团有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.）在截至 9 月的半年内收入骤降 20.4%，创 2016 年以来最大降幅，原因是全球第二大经济体经济放缓，创纪录的高金价抑制了奢侈品消费。【原文：China’s largest jewelry retailer Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd. saw revenue plunge 20.4% in the half year ended September, the biggest drop for the period since 2016 as the world’s No. 2 economy slows and record high gold prices dent luxury spending.】

item.title: 新研究显示：德国经济每年需要 28.8 万移民
item.description: 一项新的研究表明，德国经济每年将需要数十万移民，以抵消老龄化社会带来的负面影响。【原文：The German economy will need hundreds of thousands of immigrants a year to counter the negative impact from its aging society, according to a new study that feeds into an increasingly heated debate on the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁斯特纳德获准收购 Vista 户外弹药部门
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）已获得 Vista Outdoor Inc.【原文：Czech billionaire Michal Strnad has won an approval from Vista Outdoor Inc. owners to buy the company’s ammunition unit for $2.2 billion, boosting the global footprint of his fast-growing arms business.】

item.title: 预算疑云未解，法国央行行长敦促明确预算
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）呼吁，在政府努力争取议会通过预算案之际，应更明确地制定修复国家财政的计划。【原文：France’s central bank governor, Francois Villeroy de Galhau, called for more certainty around plans to repair the country’s finances as the government struggles to get the budget through parliament.】

item.title: 英特尔先进工厂获得 79 亿美元美国芯片大奖
item.description: 拜登政府已敲定向英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）提供近 79 亿美元联邦补助金的协议，这是一项旨在促进国内半导体制造业发展的计划所提供的最大一笔直接补贴。【原文：The Biden administration has finalized a deal to give Intel Corp. nearly $7.9 billion in federal grants, the largest direct subsidy from a program to boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要将提供官员削减幅度和速度的线索
item.description: 几位美联储官员已经表示，他们愿意在明年以更审慎的步伐降息，因为他们要应对共和党接管华盛顿、生产率回升和通胀改善放缓等不确定因素。【原文：Several Federal Reserve officials have signaled they’re open to cutting interest rates at a more deliberate pace next year as they grapple with the uncertainties of a Republican takeover in Washington, a pickup in productivity and slower improvement on inflation.】

item.title: 比特币反弹停滞，"超短头 "比特币 ETF 吸引创纪录资金流入
item.description: 一家基金为投资者提供了一种针对比特币的涡轮增压押注方式，该基金创下了最高日流入量，这表明一些投资者认为唐纳德-特朗普当选白宫所引发的涨势已经过头。【原文：A fund giving investors a way to turbocharge bets against Bitcoin notched its highest daily inflow in a sign that some investors consider the rally unleashed by Donald Trump’s election to the White House overdone.】

item.title: 特朗普最新关税威胁未提及地区，欧元上涨
item.description: 在欧洲躲过了唐纳德-特朗普最新一轮的贸易关税威胁后，欧元周二上涨，投资者也为欧元历史上最强劲的一个月做好了准备。【原文：The euro gained on Tuesday after Europe escaped the latest round of Donald Trump’s trade tariff threats and as investors positioned for what historically has been the strongest month for the currency.】

item.title: 英国自预算案以来首次通过银行出售债务筹集资金
item.description: 英国正在出售 2054 年到期的通胀挂钩债券，这是自上个月的预算案以来首次通过银行进行银团融资，以测试投资者的需求。【原文：The UK is selling an inflation-linked bond maturing in 2054, testing investor demand with its first syndication conducted through banks since last month’s budget.】

item.title: 麦格理因金属交易员记录虚假交易被英国罚款
item.description: 麦格理银行有限公司（Macquarie Bank Ltd.）英国分行被英国当局罚款 1300 万英镑（约合 1630 万美元），原因是该公司金属部的一名伦敦交易员在近两年的时间里通过虚构交易来掩盖损失。【原文：UK authorities fined Macquarie Bank Ltd.’s British unit £13 million ($16.3 million) after a London trader on the firm’s metals desk was able to book fictitious trades to conceal their losses for almost two years.】

item.title: 2024 年的股票波动率五年来从未如此之低
item.description: 紧张的美国总统大选、中东和乌克兰战争、欧洲政府分崩离析：尽管风险事件纷至沓来，但股票波动率正朝着2019年以来最低的年均值迈进。【原文：A tense US presidential election, wars in the Middle East and Ukraine, European governments falling apart: Despite a flurry of risk events, equity volatility is heading for its lowest annual average since 2019.】

item.title: 德意志银行的查德哈将 S&P 500 指数的目标定为 7,000 点，因为经济正在崛起
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的班基姆-查达（Bankim Chadha）认为，到明年年底，S&P 500 指数将达到 7000 点，这使他成为华尔街策略师中预测美股将进一步上涨的最乐观者。【原文：The S&P 500 will hit 7,000 points by the end of next year, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s Bankim Chadha, making him the most optimistic among Wall Street strategists predicting further gains for US stocks.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班将在数日内选出新的中央银行行长
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）可能会在几天内宣布他对央行行长和经济沙皇的人选，据一位高级部长透露，财政部长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）是负责货币政策的最热门人选。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban may announce his choices for central bank governor and a powerful economy czar in days, according to a senior minister, with finance chief Mihaly Varga the front-runner to take charge of monetary policy.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购桑坦德银行 10 亿美元贷款组合
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，Blackstone Inc. 已从 Banco Santander SA 购买了价值 10 亿美元的基础设施贷款组合权益。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has bought interests in a portfolio of infrastructure loans from Banco Santander SA worth $1 billion, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 瑞典网上药店 Apotea 在首次公开募股中募集 1.49 亿美元资金
item.description: Apotea AB 公司的所有者希望通过网上药店的上市筹集约 16.4 亿瑞典克朗（1.49 亿美元）的资金。【原文：The owners of Apotea AB are looking to raise around 1.64 billion Swedish kronor ($149 million) through a listing of the online pharmacy.】

item.title: 华为计划从 2025 年起在小工具中全面弃用安卓系统
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. said that from next year its new smartphones and tablets will run on an operating system stripped of Google’s open-source Android technology.】

item.title: 阿达尼-威尔玛公司被指因美国贿赂指控而推迟出售股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，在亿万富翁阿达尼的创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）被美国起诉贿赂后，阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）和威尔玛国际有限公司（Wilmar International Ltd.）将推迟出售其印度食品合资企业至少 12% 股份的计划。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. and Wilmar International Ltd. are said to delay a proposed sale of at least 12% in their Indian food venture after a US bribery indictment against the billionaire-founder Gautam Adani, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丹麦中央银行称部分贷款人面临二氧化碳税风险
item.description: 丹麦哥本哈根中央银行表示，丹麦对农业排放征税的计划将导致该国部分金融机构的减值费用上升，但不会威胁金融稳定。【原文：Denmark’s plan to tax agriculture emissions will lead to rising impairment charges for some of the nation’s financial institutions but won’t threaten financial stability, the central bank in Copenhagen said.】

item.title: Insight Partners 支持的印度金融科技公司 Yubi 计划进行新一轮融资
item.description: 印度金融科技平台 Yubi 正寻求在明年初筹集高达 2 亿美元的资金，用于全球扩张，该公司在缩小亏损后开始了新一轮融资。【原文：Indian fintech platform Yubi is looking to raise up to $200 million early next year to finance its global expansion, as the company embarks on a new funding round after narrowing its losses.】

item.title: ZiG 货币动荡消退有助于降低津巴布韦的通货膨胀率
item.description: 津巴布韦的月通胀率在四个月来首次放缓，因为困扰该国以黄金为支撑的 ZiG 货币的波动性有减弱的迹象。【原文：Zimbabwe’s monthly inflation rate slowed for the first time in four months, as volatility that’s plagued the nation’s gold-backed ZiG currency shows signs of ebbing.】

item.title: BPM 银行将讨论联合信贷银行 110 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 将讨论意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）出人意料的收购要约，投资者正在等待该银行对这一令金融市场和罗马政府感到震惊的举动做出回应。【原文：Banco BPM SpA is set to discuss the surprise takeover bid from UniCredit SpA, with investors waiting for a response to a move that has rattled financial markets and the government in Rome.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称若预测成立将进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，如果政策制定者对通胀的预测成立，那么更多的降息措施即将出台。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said more reductions in interest rates are on the way if policymakers’ forecasts for inflation hold.】

item.title: 瑞典要求与电缆破损有关的船只靠近其水域
item.description: 瑞典首相乌尔夫-克里斯特松（Ulf Kristersson）表示，瑞典当局已要求与波罗的海数据电缆断裂有关的中国船只靠近瑞典水域。【原文：Sweden’s authorities have requested that the Chinese vessel linked to broken data cables in the Baltic Sea move closer to its waters, Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson said.】

item.title: 皮博迪申请 21 亿美元贷款收购英格洛煤炭业务
item.description: 皮博迪能源公司从多家银行和私人信贷机构获得了 20.75 亿美元的过桥贷款，以支持其收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的炼钢煤业务。【原文：Peabody Energy Corp. has obtained a $2.075 billion bridge loan from a mix of banks and private credit to back its acquisition of Anglo American Plc’s steelmaking coal business.】

item.title: 法院对汽车贷款做出裁决后，银行为巨额赔款做好准备
item.description: 一项质疑汽车贷款佣金支付合法性的法庭裁决给英国银行业敲响了警钟。【原文：A court ruling that challenges the legality of car loan commission payments is ringing alarm bells in the UK banking industry.】

item.title: 以色列政府确信受战争重创的经济最糟糕的时期已经过去
item.description: 以色列政府相信，随着战事的缓和，受加沙和黎巴嫩战争影响的经济明年将强劲反弹。【原文：Israel’s government is confident the economy, strained by wars in Gaza and Lebanon, will rebound strongly next year as fighting eases.】

item.title: 法国政府审查企业资产，考虑进行投资
item.description: 就在法国政府提出收购阿托斯公司（Atos SE）的高级计算业务之后，法国财政部长告诉《回声报》，法国正在考虑对战略公司进行投资，并对其企业资产进行审查。【原文：France is eying investments in strategic companies and conducting a review of its corporate assets, the country’s finance minister told Les Echos newspaper just after the government offered to buy Atos SE’s advanced computing business.】

item.title: 菲律宾信用评级接近上调，S&P 更改展望
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，它将菲律宾的信用前景调整为正面，使这个东南亚国家更接近其 "A "主权评级的目标。【原文：S&P Global Ratings said it revised the Philippines’ credit outlook to positive, putting the Southeast Asian nation closer to its goal of an ‘A’ sovereign rating.】

item.title: 印度股票在 10 个月内吸引了 700 亿美元的本地投资者
item.description: 今年前 10 个月，印度投资者向本地股票投入了 700 多亿美元，在全球基金纷纷撤离之际，印度股票流入量有望创下年度纪录。【原文：Indian investors have poured more than $70 billion into local stocks in the first 10 months of the year, putting inflows on track to reach an annual record just as global funds are exiting.】
